**AI Assistant:**
Hey there! I'm here to help with any questions you might have about Verus. What's on your mind today?

**User:**
I heard there's a new feature in Verus Desktop v0.9.2 that visualizes the cross-chain network. What is it?

**AI Assistant:**
That's correct! The new feature is a 3-dimensional cross-chain network visualizer, which shows all currency conversion and fractional network connections both on-chain and cross-chain. It allows users to move around and zoom in and out in 3 dimensions.

**User:**
That sounds amazing! How can I access the 3D cross-chain network visualizer in Verus Desktop?

**AI Assistant:**
To access the visualizer, click on “Visualize Network” on the Metaverse tab of Verus Desktop. It's easy to find and use!

**User:**
What's new on the Verus testnet?

**AI Assistant:**
All PBaaS (Public Blockchain as a Service) capabilities, including those for application development, are now available on the new Verus testnet. This includes capabilities for interoperability, such as the Ethereum/Rinkeby bridge, which is expected to be launched soon.

**User:**
What's the goal of the new Verus testnet in terms of interoperability?

**AI Assistant:**
The goal is to launch the Ethereum/Rinkeby bridge in the near future, which will enable seamless interaction between different blockchain networks.

**User:**
That sounds really exciting! When can we expect to see the Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS) features and interoperability capabilities on the mainnet?

**AI Assistant:**
These new capabilities, including the PBaaS features and interoperability capabilities, will be available on the mainnet soon. We're working hard to get everything ready for you!

What is the new feature available in Verus Desktop v0.9.2 that allows visualizing the cross-chain network?

The new feature is a 3-dimensional cross-chain network visualizer, which shows all currency conversion and fractional network connections both on-chain and cross-chain. It allows users to move around and zoom in and out in 3 dimensions.

## NEW 3D CROSS-CHAIN LIQUIDITY NETWORK VISUALIZER (GUI FOR TESTNET) In v0.9.2 Verus Desktop, there is a new 3-dimensional cross-chain network visualizer, which shows all currency conversion and fractional network connections both on chain and cross-chain, with the ability to move around and zoom in and out in 3 dimensions. To access the visualizer, click on “Visualize Network” on the Metaverse tab of Verus Desktop. If you’re interested in seeing the visualizer now, here’s a link directly to the visualizer as part of a recent video members of the community helped make (https://youtu.be/CkgUVjx_g1M?t=43).## NEW PBAAS CAPABILITIES All PBaaS capabilities, including for application development, are available now on the new Verus testnet. Our goal for interoperability on this new testnet is to launch the Ethereum/Rinkeby bridge in the next couple days. Now would be a good time for development capable projects hoping to get a head start on using Verus’s transformative technologies to do a deep dive on the Verus testnet. These new capabilities in v0.9.2, as well as all those we are familiar with, available nowhere else, will be on mainnet SOON(™):
